channel.title: Can anyone read the rules?
channel.description:
This question is directed to everyone posting in this section.
Why don't you all read the rules? If you are posting a question having to do with a server post in the Server Development/Help If you are posting a question having to do with clients post in the Client Hacking Section. If you are posting a question about the MoparScape client/webclient post HERE If you are posting a misc. question post here.
If you don't want to think of it as doing the RIGHT THING, think of it as your question will be answered quicker

item.title: Can anyone read the rules?
item.dc:creator: @dark24 dark24
item.description:
@dark24 wrote:

This is why we have stickies. Do not post such threads.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone read the rules?

I side with boomer.
And people asking me why I flamed Heroic - because he posted a question in the damn tut section! :mad:
